name: Family Man (itch)
description:
This game is a small mini game of cleaning your house. you're in a rush because she's almost home but you've been playing too many video games to clean! :O 

Controls: 

(Portal section):                                          (Cleaning section):

W A S D - Movement.                               W A S D - Movement.

R - Rotate portal direction.                    E - Interact/Pickup.

LMB - Fire Portal.                                         P - Pause Game/Time.

P - Pause Game/Time.
